Approval(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `owner` enables `approved` to manage the `tokenId` token.

ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when `owner` enables or disables (`approved`) `operator` to manage all of its assets.

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `tokenId` token is transferred from `from` to `to`.

batchSetDeadline(uint256[],uint256[]).details: Only callable by the NFT_MINTER role.

params._name: The name of the NFT token
params._registry: The address of the Registry contract.
params._symbol: The name of the NFT token

mint((uint256,uint256,address,uint256)).details: Only callable by the NFT_MINTER role.

params._nftParams: The SafeMintParams struct containing the parameters for minting the NFT.

mint(bytes,(uint256,uint256,address,uint.details: The signature should be created by the user with NFT_MINTER role assigned.

params._nftParams: The SafeMintParams struct containing the parameters for minting the NFT.
params._sig: The signature used to validate the minter.

mintBatch((uint256,uint256,address,uint2.details: Only callable by the NFT_MINTER role.

params._nftParams: The array of SafeMintParams struct containing the parameters for minting the NFT.

setBaseURI(string).details: Only callable by the NFT_MINTER role.

batchSetDeadline(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Sets deadlines for a batch of ids

hasUserActiveToken(address).notice: Returns a flag whether the user has an active token

haveUsersActiveTokens(address[]).notice: Returns an array of flag whether the user has an active token

mint((uint256,uint256,address,uint256)).notice: Mints an NFT with the provided parameters.

mint(bytes,(uint256,uint256,address,uint.notice: Mints an NFT with the provided signature and parameters.

mintBatch((uint256,uint256,address,uint2.notice: Mints NFT batch with the provided parameters.
